message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a good price for you, but I'm still hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can offer $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $125 is a good offer, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you at that price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not there. I can offer $128. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I'll sell it to you for $129. It's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $127. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $129, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is a fair price. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $128. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I can offer $126. That's my final offer.
